alert.note: Alert for Butte, Blackfoot Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 23 at 3:15AM MST until February 23 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Butte, Georgetown Lake, Highway 12 Garrison to Elliston, Homestake Pass, and MacDonald Pass. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 8 AM MST this morning. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 8 AM this morning to noon MST today. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
